HOME.PARAGRAPH_1: opened doors on 15th of December 2023 in Studentski grad, Sofia city on 10 Stoian Kambarev str.
HOME.PARAGRAPH_2: The establishment provides over a hundred different hookahs and hundreds of different tobaccos.
HOME.PARAGRAPH_3: We also have assortments of dishes and different lunch menu each day. Wide variety of cocktails and alcoholic drinks.
HOME.PARAGRAPH_4: This spring we will open an outdoors closed garden which will allow the gathering of big parties.

CONTACTS.NO_CONSENT: Please, allow the usage of your personal data in order to use Google Maps

CONSENT.TEXT: We use Google Maps services to provide you with interactive maps and location-based information. By continuing to use our website, you consent to the collection and processing of your personal data.

INFORMATION.P_1: We want to inform you that our website utilizes Google Maps services to provide location-based information and interactive maps. In order to enhance your experience and provide you with accurate geographical data, we collect and process certain personal data. Your privacy and data protection are of utmost importance to us, and we want to ensure that you are fully informed about the data we collect and how it is used.
INFORMATION.P_3: We collect your location data and other relevant information to display maps and provide location-based services through Google Maps on our website.
INFORMATION.P_5: The data we collect may include your IP address, geographical location, and cookies to improve the functionality and accuracy of our mapping services.
INFORMATION.P_7: Please note that your data will be shared with Google, as they provide the mapping service used on our website. Google's privacy policy governs the collection and processing of data by Google Maps.
INFORMATION.P_9: By continuing to use our website and accessing the Google Maps services, you consent to the collection and processing of your personal data as described in this notice.
INFORMATION.P_11: You have the option to withdraw your consent at any time. You can manage your preferences by deleting the cookies on this website. Please note that certain features of our website may not function properly without access to location data.
INFORMATION.P_13: We also use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized content. By continuing to use our website, you consent to the use of cookies.
